page.title: 15HOW LOCALS SEE PETERCULTER.
page.content: { {ENTERTAINMENT The community centre is enjoyed by all the old people.In the community centre there is quite a selection of activities including badminton, bingo, bowling and table-tennis.Bowling seemed to be the most popular. { {PRIMARY SCHOOLS Peterculter Primary School is quite large compared to Milltimber School.Culter has 480 pupils and Milltimber has 190.The pupils all seem to like their area but they would mostly like to see more shops and outdoor activities.The children who lived in Milltimber didn't like their school as much as those in Peterculter.
